strcpy You
strcat YouMe
strcmp -101
atoi 12345 -54321
itoa 23456 -65432
substring cdef
insert abXYZcdefg

length 3
strcpy You
strcat YouMe
strcmp -101
atoi 12345 -54321
itoa 12345 -54321
substring cdef
insert abXYZcdefg
